thread.title: Morgan Spurlock to attend Gold Coast International Film Festival
thread.title_full: Morgan Spurlock to attend Gold Coast International Film Festival | Newsday

author: RAFER GUZM√ÅN
title: Morgan Spurlock to attend Gold Coast International Film Festival
text:
Morgan Spurlock will speak at a special screening of his short documentary "Crafted" on the opening night of this year's Gold Coast International Film Festival, which runs Nov. 9 through 15.
Other guests scheduled to attend include director Patricia Riggen and actor Lou Diamond Phillips, both of the upcoming drama "The 33" about 33 miners who were trapped underground for 69 days.
Michael Cuesta, the Dix Hills-raised director of Showtime's "Homeland" and his star, Navid Negahban, will also appear.
The festival's complete lineup and ticket information are available at goldcoastfilmfestival.org.
